question: What genre is most represented in which century? Plot me the result with all the most represented and the amount of pieces in the databse in form of a bar chart.

xmode.content: What genre is most represented in which century? Plot me the result with all the most represented and the amount of pieces in the databse in form of a bar chart.

args.problem: What genre is most represented in which century? Include the amount of pieces in the database.

args.question: Prepare data for plotting the most represented genre per century with the amount of pieces.

xmode.content:
{'status': 'success', 'plot_path': '/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/openai-gpt-4o/run-20251211-050945-r001/most_represented_genre_per_century.png', 'note': "Plot created successfully!:
```python
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Data
data = [
    {'century': 15, 'genre': 'religious art', 'count': 42},
    {'century': 16, 'genre': 'religious art', 'count': 11},
    {'century': 18, 'genre': 'history painting', 'count': 8},
    {'century': 19, 'genre': 'nude', 'count': 8},
    {'century': 20, 'genre': 'religious art', 'count': 1}
]

# Extracting data for plotting
centuries = [item['century'] for item in data]
counts = [item['count'] for item in data]
genres = [item['genre'] for item in data]

# Plotting
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.bar(centuries, counts, color='skyblue')
plt.xlabel('Century')
plt.ylabel('Number of Pieces')
plt.title('Most Represented Genre per Century')
plt.xticks(centuries)

# Adding text labels
for i, (century, count, genre) in enumerate(zip(centuries, counts, genres)):
    plt.text(century, count + 0.5, f'{genre}', ha='center')

# Save the plot
plt.savefig('/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/openai-gpt-4o/run-20251211-050945-r001/most_represented_genre_per_century.png')
plt.close()
```
Stdout: "}
